reviewtext: Better Hand Writing recognition ! MP3 ! Better integration w/MS Applications (no surprise) Word, Excel ! Better NOTES I use it all the time, while the Palm sat.Needs a faster CPU, a little slow You really  need a CompactFlash if you want to listen to lots of MP3 (I have a 96meg).  Need a way to close applications when your done. Overall a GREAT Device And  I DO NOT work for MS of HP
summary: Better then the Palm (V) - Almost Right
